definitions.definition: The state of being out of proportion ; an abnormal or improper ratio ; an imbalance .
Lack of suitableness, adequacy, or due proportion to an end or use; unsuitableness.

main_definition: The state of being out of proportion ; an abnormal or improper ratio ; an imbalance .
secondary_definitions: Lack of suitableness, adequacy, or due proportion to an end or use; unsuitableness.
